content: this super stylish and modern wedge crochet project bag is easy to make and a perfect pattern for a beginner it creates a lovely crochet project bag for those who crochet on the go the project bag featured a leather wrist handle which you can use to hang the bag on your wrist while you crochet on the go there is also an opening on the side which you can use to thread your working yarn through or earphone cable etc it uses basic crochet stitches it is a superb stash busting project too as it uses small amount of aran weight yarn you will also need 20 cm zip and a piece of leather strap this can also be replaced with crocheted strap
